name: Forlorn (godcomplex.games)
description:
What if there is more than one world? More than one dimension? And this realm is colliding with ours?  

Welcome to Ylvarrah, realm of the dead.

In this 3D-Stealth Adventure you're waking up in this mysterious world and it doesn't take long to notice: You're not alone. 

Sneak through the dark and ominous caves and tunnels of this forsaken world. Hide from dangerous creatures and venture further down into the depths. Use your environment to your advantage and don't let yourself be caught by the beings that dwell in the deep. 


For an optimal experience we recommend playing with a controller. Though playing with keyboard and mouse is also supported.

If you're using a DualShock Controller, remember to use DS4 Input for optimal usage. 

An overview for the controls can be seen in the game at all times by pressing either "Start" on the Controller or "Escape" on your keyboard.

We hope you're having fun playing!
